reviews.review_text: Paper quality and photography definition poor otherwise a good reference book
Awesome book from one Mehariste to another...

title: Ibiza Bohemia
word_cloud: quality photography definition poor otherwise good reference amaze wonderful picture
summary: From roaring nightlife to peaceful yoga retreats, Ibiza’s hippie-chic atmosphere is its hallmark. This quintessential Mediterranean hot spot has served as an escape for artists, creatives, and musicians alike for decades. It is a place to reinvent oneself, to walk the fine line between civilization and wilderness, and to discover bliss.
